name: Momentum RSI 5m Reversal
description: Enter long when rsi1_chg_5m drops below -2% and price change over 5 minutes (c_chg_5m) is positive, indicating a brief pullback in an upward momentum trend. Exit after 10 minutes or if rsi1_chg_5m crosses above 0.

name: Volume Spike Continuation
description: Enter long when volume change over 1 minute (v_chg_1m) exceeds 10% and price change over 1 minute (c_chg_1m) is positive, capitalizing on short-term momentum continuation. Exit after 5 minutes or if volume change drops below 5%.

name: Liquidity Side Shift Scalping
description: Enter long when lqside_chg_1m increases by more than 3%, indicating increasing buy-side liquidity, with stable or increasing rsi60_chg_1m. Exit after 3 minutes or if lqside_chg_1m reverses below 0%.
